sentences: In its decision (FCCC/CP/2008/L.6), the COP decides to change by one week the dates for COP 15 in Copenhagen in 2009 (to avoid overlap with the Eid Al-Adha Islamic festival).
The dates will now be 7-18 December 2009.

Also, the COP invites offers to host COP 16 (which should come from Latin America and the Caribbean), and accepts South Africa s offer to host COP 17 in 2011, subject to confirmation by the COP Bureau.
Finally, the COP adopts the dates of 3-14 June and 11-22 November for the sessional periods in 2013.
